[Ghost Blade](/Feats.aspx?ID=3864) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 205</row>

**Archetype** [Mind Smith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=194)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Mind Smith Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3862)

</column>

---

You alter your weapon's phase so it can more easily strike incorporeal creatures. Your mind weapon gains the effects of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune for 1 minute.
